DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare treatment wearing shoe incline kinesitherapy first treatment offer primary care physicians chronic Achilles tendinopathy .
DOC.brief_title: Reeducation Chronic Achilles Tendinopathy Wearing Shoes Inclined Versus Reeducation Kinesitherapy
DOC.criteria: Age : 1875 year Disease : chronic Achilles tendinopathy de novo recurrent confirm ultrasound Patients sign informed consent study participation Patients cover medical insurance Patients behavioral disorder History rupture Achilles tendon ( = stage 4 ) Antibiotic treatment tendinotoxique ( Quinolones , ... ) Inability walk 30 minute per day .
